name: Joshua 8:3
text: So Joshua arose, and all the people of war, to go up to Ai. Joshua chose thirty thousand men, the mighty men of valor, and sent them out by night.

name: Joshua 8:4
text: He commanded them, saying, "Behold, you shall lie in ambush against the city, behind the city. Don"t go very far from the city, but all of you be ready.

name: Joshua 8:5
text: I, and all the people who are with me, will approach to the city. It shall happen, when they come out against us, as at the first, that we will flee before them.

name: Joshua 8:6
text: They will come out after us, until we have drawn them away from the city; for they will say, "They flee before us, like the first time." So we will flee before them,

name: Joshua 8:7
text: and you shall rise up from the ambush, and take possession of the city; for Yahweh your God will deliver it into your hand.

name: Joshua 8:8
text: It shall be, when you have seized on the city, that you shall set the city on fire. You shall do this according to the word of Yahweh. Behold, I have commanded you."

name: Joshua 8:9
text: Joshua sent them out; and they went to set up the ambush, and stayed between Bethel and Ai, on the west side of Ai; but Joshua stayed among the people that night.

name: Joshua 8:10
text: Joshua rose up early in the morning, mustered the people, and went up, he and the elders of Israel, before the people to Ai.

name: Joshua 8:11
text: All the people, even the men of war who were with him, went up, and drew near, and came before the city, and encamped on the north side of Ai. Now there was a valley between him and Ai.

name: Joshua 8:12
text: He took about five thousand men, and set them in ambush between Bethel and Ai, on the west side of the city.

name: Joshua 8:13
text: So they set the people, even all the army who was on the north of the city, and their ambush on the west of the city; and Joshua went that night into the midst of the valley.

name: Joshua 8:14
text: It happened, when the king of Ai saw it, that they hurried and rose up early, and the men of the city went out against Israel to battle, he and all his people, at the time appointed, before the Arabah; but he didn"t know that there was an ambush against him behind the city.

name: Joshua 8:15
text: Joshua and all Israel made as if they were beaten before them, and fled by the way of the wilderness.

name: Joshua 8:16
text: All the people who were in the city were called together to pursue after them. They pursued Joshua, and were drawn away from the city.

name: Joshua 8:17
text: There was not a man left in Ai or Beth El who didn"t go out after Israel. They left the city open, and pursued Israel.

name: Joshua 8:18
text: Yahweh said to Joshua, "Stretch out the javelin that is in your hand toward Ai, for I will give it into your hand." Joshua stretched out the javelin that was in his hand toward the city.

name: Joshua 8:19
text: The ambush arose quickly out of their place, and they ran as soon as he had stretched out his hand, and entered into the city, and took it. They hurried and set the city on fire.

name: Joshua 8:20
text: When the men of Ai looked behind them, they saw, and behold, the smoke of the city ascended up to heaven, and they had no power to flee this way or that way. The people who fled to the wilderness turned back on the pursuers.

name: Joshua 8:21
text: When Joshua and all Israel saw that the ambush had taken the city, and that the smoke of the city ascended, then they turned again, and killed the men of Ai.

name: Joshua 8:22
text: The others came out of the city against them, so they were in the midst of Israel, some on this side, and some on that side. They struck them, so that they let none of them remain or escape.

name: Joshua 8:23
text: They captured the king of Ai alive, and brought him to Joshua.

name: Joshua 8:24
text: It happened, when Israel had made an end of killing all the inhabitants of Ai in the field, in the wilderness in which they pursued them, and they had all fallen by the edge of the sword, until they were consumed, that all Israel returned to Ai, and struck it with the edge of the sword.

name: Joshua 8:25
text: All that fell that day, both of men and women, were twelve thousand, even all the men of Ai.

name: Joshua 8:26
text: For Joshua didn"t draw back his hand, with which he stretched out the javelin, until he had utterly destroyed all the inhabitants of Ai.

name: Joshua 8:27
text: Only the livestock and the spoil of that city Israel took for prey to themselves, according to the word of Yahweh which he commanded Joshua.

name: Joshua 8:28
text: So Joshua burnt Ai, and made it a heap forever, even a desolation, to this day.

name: Joshua 8:29
text: He hanged the king of Ai on a tree until the evening, and at the sundown Joshua commanded, and they took his body down from the tree, and threw it at the entrance of the gate of the city, and raised a great heap of stones on it that remains to this day.

name: Joshua 8:30
text: Then Joshua built an altar to Yahweh, the God of Israel, in Mount Ebal,

name: Joshua 8:31
text: as Moses the servant of Yahweh commanded the children of Israel, as it is written in the book of the law of Moses, an altar of uncut stones, on which no man had lifted up any iron. They offered burnt offerings on it to Yahweh, and sacrificed peace offerings.

name: Joshua 8:32
text: He wrote there on the stones a copy of the law of Moses, which he wrote in the presence of the children of Israel.

name: Joshua 8:33
text: All Israel, and their elders and officers, and their judges, stood on this side of the ark and on that side before the priests the Levites, who carried the ark of Yahweh"s covenant, the foreigner as well as the native; half of them in front of Mount Gerizim, and half of them in front of Mount Ebal, as Moses the servant of Yahweh had commanded at the first, that they should bless the people of Israel.

name: Joshua 8:34
text: Afterward he read all the words of the law, the blessing and the curse, according to all that is written in the book of the law.

name: Joshua 8:35
text: There was not a word of all that Moses commanded, which Joshua didn"t read before all the assembly of Israel, with the women, the little ones, and the foreigners who were among them.

name: Joshua 9:1
text: It happened, when all the kings who were beyond the Jordan, in the hill country, and in the lowland, and on all the shore of the great sea in front of Lebanon, the Hittite, the Amorite, the Canaanite, the Perizzite, the Hivite, and the Jebusite, heard of it

name: Joshua 9:2
text: that they gathered themselves together to fight with Joshua and with Israel, with one accord.

name: Joshua 9:3
text: But when the inhabitants of Gibeon heard what Joshua had done to Jericho and to Ai,

name: Joshua 9:4
text: they also resorted to a ruse, and went and made as if they had been ambassadors, and took old sacks on their donkeys, and wineskins, old and torn and bound up,

name: Joshua 9:5
text: and old and patched shoes on their feet, and wore old garments. All the bread of their provision was dry and moldy.

name: Joshua 9:6
text: They went to Joshua to the camp at Gilgal, and said to him, and to the men of Israel, "We have come from a far country. Now therefore make a covenant with us."

name: Joshua 9:7
text: The men of Israel said to the Hivites, "What if you live among us. How could we make a covenant with you?"

name: Joshua 9:8
text: They said to Joshua, "We are your servants." Joshua said to them, "Who are you? Where do you come from?"

name: Joshua 9:9
text: They said to him, "Your servants have come from a very far country because of the name of Yahweh your God; for we have heard of his fame, all that he did in Egypt,

name: Joshua 9:10
text: and all that he did to the two kings of the Amorites who were beyond the Jordan, to Sihon king of Heshbon and to Og king of Bashan, who was at Ashtaroth.

name: Joshua 9:11
text: Our elders and all the inhabitants of our country spoke to us, saying, "Take provision in your hand for the journey, and go to meet them, and tell them, "We are your servants. Now make a covenant with us.""

name: Joshua 9:12
text: This our bread we took hot for our provision out of our houses on the day we went out to go to you; but now, behold, it is dry, and has become moldy.

name: Joshua 9:13
text: These wineskins, which we filled, were new; and behold, they are torn. These our garments and our shoes have become old because of the very long journey."

name: Joshua 9:14
text: The men sampled their provisions, and didn"t ask counsel from the mouth of Yahweh.

name: Joshua 9:15
text: Joshua made peace with them, and made a covenant with them, to let them live. The princes of the congregation swore to them.

name: Joshua 9:16
text: It happened at the end of three days after they had made a covenant with them, that they heard that they were their neighbors, and that they lived among them.

name: Joshua 9:17
text: The children of Israel traveled and came to their cities on the third day. Now their cities were Gibeon, Chephirah, Beeroth, and Kiriath Jearim.

name: Joshua 9:18
text: The children of Israel didn"t strike them, because the princes of the congregation had sworn to them by Yahweh, the God of Israel. All the congregation murmured against the princes.

name: Joshua 9:19
text: But all the princes said to all the congregation, "We have sworn to them by Yahweh, the God of Israel: now therefore we may not touch them.

name: Joshua 9:20
text: This we will do to them, and let them live; lest wrath be on us, because of the oath which we swore to them."

name: Joshua 9:21
text: The princes said to them, "Let them live, so they became wood cutters and drawers of water for all the congregation, as the princes had spoken to them."

name: Joshua 9:22
text: Joshua called for them, and he spoke to them, saying, "Why have you deceived us, saying, "We are very far from you," when you live among us?

name: Joshua 9:23
text: Now therefore you are cursed, and some of you will never fail to be bondservants, both wood cutters and drawers of water for the house of my God."

name: Joshua 9:24
text: They answered Joshua, and said, "Because your servants were certainly told how Yahweh your God commanded his servant Moses to give you all the land, and to destroy all the inhabitants of the land from before you. Therefore we were very afraid for our lives because of you, and have done this thing.

name: Joshua 9:25
text: Now, behold, we are in your hand. Do to us as it seems good and right to you to do."

name: Joshua 9:26
text: He did so to them, and delivered them out of the hand of the children of Israel, so that they didn"t kill them.

name: Joshua 9:27
text: That day Joshua made them wood cutters and drawers of water for the congregation and for the altar of Yahweh, to this day, in the place which he should choose.

name: Joshua 10:1
text: Now it happened when Adoni-Zedek king of Jerusalem heard how Joshua had taken Ai, and had utterly destroyed it; as he had done to Jericho and her king, so he had done to Ai and her king; and how the inhabitants of Gibeon had made peace with Israel, and were among them;

name: Joshua 10:2
text: that they were very afraid, because Gibeon was a great city, as one of the royal cities, and because it was greater than Ai, and all its men were mighty.

name: Joshua 10:3
text: Therefore Adoni-Zedek king of Jerusalem sent to Hoham king of Hebron, to Piram king of Jarmuth, to Japhia king of Lachish, and to Debir king of Eglon, saying,

name: Joshua 10:4
text: "Come up to me, and help me, and let us strike Gibeon; for it has made peace with Joshua and with the children of Israel."

name: Joshua 10:5
text: Therefore the five kings of the Amorites, the king of Jerusalem, the king of Hebron, the king of Jarmuth, the king of Lachish, the king of Eglon, gathered themselves together, and went up, they and all their armies, and encamped against Gibeon, and made war against it.

name: Joshua 10:6
text: The men of Gibeon sent to Joshua to the camp to Gilgal, saying, "Don"t abandon your servants! Come up to us quickly, and save us, and help us; for all the kings of the Amorites that dwell in the hill country have gathered together against us."

name: Joshua 10:7
text: So Joshua went up from Gilgal, he, and all the people of war with him, and all the mighty men of valor.

name: Joshua 10:8
text: Yahweh said to Joshua, "Don"t fear them, for I have delivered them into your hands. Not a man of them will stand before you."

name: Joshua 10:9
text: Joshua therefore came on them suddenly. He went up from Gilgal all night.

name: Joshua 10:10
text: Yahweh confused them before Israel, and he killed them with a great slaughter at Gibeon, and chased them by the way of the ascent of Beth Horon, and struck them to Azekah and to Makkedah.

name: Joshua 10:11
text: It happened, as they fled from before Israel, while they were at the descent of Beth Horon, that Yahweh cast down great stones from the sky on them to Azekah, and they died. There were more who died from the hailstones than who the children of Israel killed with the sword.

name: Joshua 10:12
text: Then Joshua spoke to Yahweh in the day when Yahweh delivered up the Amorites before the children of Israel; and he said in the sight of Israel, "Sun, stand still on Gibeon! You, moon, stop in the valley of Aijalon!"

name: Joshua 10:13
text: The sun stood still, and the moon stayed, until the nation had avenged themselves of their enemies. Isn"t this written in the book of Jashar? The sun stayed in the midst of the sky, and didn"t hurry to go down about a whole day.

name: Joshua 10:14
text: There was no day like that before it or after it, that Yahweh listened to the voice of a man; for Yahweh fought for Israel.

name: Joshua 10:15
text: Joshua returned, and all Israel with him, to the camp to Gilgal.

name: Joshua 10:16
text: These five kings fled, and hid themselves in the cave at Makkedah.

name: Joshua 10:17
text: Joshua was told, saying, "The five kings are found, hidden in the cave at Makkedah."

name: Joshua 10:18
text: Joshua said, "Roll large stones to the mouth of the cave, and set men by it to guard them;

name: Joshua 10:19
text: but don"t stay. Pursue your enemies, and them from the rear. Don"t allow them to enter into their cities; for Yahweh your God has delivered them into your hand."

name: Joshua 10:20
text: It happened, when Joshua and the children of Israel had finished killing them with a very great slaughter until they were consumed, and the remnant which remained of them had entered into the fortified cities,

name: Joshua 10:21
text: that all the people returned to the camp to Joshua at Makkedah in peace. None moved his tongue against any of the children of Israel.

name: Joshua 10:22
text: Then Joshua said, "Open the mouth of the cave, and bring those five kings out of the cave to me."

name: Joshua 10:23
text: They did so, and brought those five kings out of the cave to him: the king of Jerusalem, the king of Hebron, the king of Jarmuth, the king of Lachish, and the king of Eglon.

name: Joshua 10:24
text: It happened, when they brought those kings out to Joshua, that Joshua called for all the men of Israel, and said to the chiefs of the men of war who went with him, "Come near, put your feet on the necks of these kings." They came near, and put their feet on their necks.

name: Joshua 10:25
text: Joshua said to them, "Don"t be afraid, nor be dismayed. Be strong and courageous, for Yahweh will do this to all your enemies against whom you fight."

name: Joshua 10:26
text: Afterward Joshua struck them, put them to death, and hanged them on five trees. They were hanging on the trees until the evening.

name: Joshua 10:27
text: It happened at the time of the going down of the sun, that Joshua commanded, and they took them down off the trees, and cast them into the cave in which they had hidden themselves, and laid great stones on the mouth of the cave, which remain to this very day.

name: Joshua 10:28
text: Joshua took Makkedah on that day, and struck it with the edge of the sword, with its king. He utterly destroyed them and all the souls who were in it. He left none remaining. He did to the king of Makkedah as he had done to the king of Jericho.

name: Joshua 10:29
text: Joshua passed from Makkedah, and all Israel with him, to Libnah, and fought against Libnah.

name: Joshua 10:30
text: Yahweh delivered it also, with its king, into the hand of Israel. He struck it with the edge of the sword, and all the souls who were in it. He left none remaining in it. He did to its king as he had done to the king of Jericho.

name: Joshua 10:31
text: Joshua passed from Libnah, and all Israel with him, to Lachish, and encamped against it, and fought against it.

name: Joshua 10:32
text: Yahweh delivered Lachish into the hand of Israel. He took it on the second day, and struck it with the edge of the sword, with all the souls who were in it, according to all that he had done to Libnah.

name: Joshua 10:33
text: Then Horam king of Gezer came up to help Lachish; and Joshua struck him and his people, until he had left him none remaining.

name: Joshua 10:34
text: Joshua passed from Lachish, and all Israel with him, to Eglon; and they encamped against it fought against it.

name: Joshua 10:35
text: They took it on that day, and struck it with the edge of the sword. He utterly destroyed all the souls who were in it that day, according to all that he had done to Lachish.

name: Joshua 10:36
text: Joshua went up from Eglon, and all Israel with him, to Hebron; and they fought against it.

name: Joshua 10:37
text: They took it, and struck it with the edge of the sword, with its king and all its cities, and all the souls who were in it. He left none remaining, according to all that he had done to Eglon; but he utterly destroyed it, and all the souls who were in it.

name: Joshua 10:38
text: Joshua returned, and all Israel with him, to Debir, and fought against it.

name: Joshua 10:39
text: He took it, with its king and all its cities. They struck them with the edge of the sword, and utterly destroyed all the souls who were in it. He left none remaining. As he had done to Hebron, so he did to Debir, and to its king; as he had done also to Libnah, and to its king.

name: Joshua 10:40
text: So Joshua struck all the land, the hill country, and the South, and the lowland, and the slopes, and all their kings. He left none remaining, but he utterly destroyed all that breathed, as Yahweh, the God of Israel, commanded.

name: Joshua 10:41
text: Joshua struck them from Kadesh Barnea even to Gaza, and all the country of Goshen, even to Gibeon.

name: Joshua 10:42
text: Joshua took all these kings and their land at one time, because Yahweh, the God of Israel, fought for Israel.

name: Joshua 10:43
text: Joshua returned, and all Israel with him, to the camp to Gilgal.

name: Joshua 11:1
text: It happened, when Jabin king of Hazor heard of it, that he sent to Jobab king of Madon, to the king of Shimron, to the king of Achshaph,

name: Joshua 11:2
text: and to the kings who were on the north, in the hill country, in the Arabah south of Chinneroth, in the lowland, and in the heights of Dor on the west,

name: Joshua 11:3
text: to the Canaanite on the east and on the west, and the Amorite, and the Hittite, and the Perizzite, and the Jebusite in the hill country, and the Hivite under Hermon in the land of Mizpah.

name: Joshua 11:4
text: They went out, they and all their armies with them, many people, even as the sand that is on the seashore in multitude, with very many horses and chariots.

name: Joshua 11:5
text: All these kings met together; and they came and encamped together at the waters of Merom, to fight with Israel.

name: Joshua 11:6
text: Yahweh said to Joshua, "Don"t be afraid because of them; for tomorrow at this time, I will deliver them up all slain before Israel. You shall hamstring their horses and burn their chariots with fire."

name: Joshua 11:7
text: So Joshua came, and all the people of war with him, against them by the waters of Merom suddenly, and fell on them.

name: Joshua 11:8
text: Yahweh delivered them into the hand of Israel, and they struck them, and chased them to great Sidon, and to Misrephoth Maim, and to the valley of Mizpeh eastward. They struck them until they left them none remaining.

name: Joshua 11:9
text: Joshua did to them as Yahweh told him. He hamstrung their horses and burnt their chariots with fire.

name: Joshua 11:10
text: Joshua turned back at that time, and took Hazor, and struck its king with the sword: for Hazor used to be the head of all those kingdoms.

name: Joshua 11:11
text: They struck all the souls who were in it with the edge of the sword, utterly destroying them. There was no one left who breathed. He burnt Hazor with fire.

name: Joshua 11:12
text: Joshua captured all the cities of those kings, with their kings, and he struck them with the edge of the sword, and utterly destroyed them; as Moses the servant of Yahweh commanded.

name: Joshua 11:13
text: But as for the cities that stood on their mounds, Israel burned none of them, except Hazor only. Joshua burned that.

name: Joshua 11:14
text: The children of Israel took all the spoil of these cities, with the livestock, as spoils for themselves; but every man they struck with the edge of the sword, until they had destroyed them. They didn"t leave any who breathed.

name: Joshua 11:15
text: As Yahweh commanded Moses his servant, so Moses commanded Joshua. Joshua did so. He left nothing undone of all that Yahweh commanded Moses.

name: Joshua 11:16
text: So Joshua captured all that land, the hill country, all the South, all the land of Goshen, the lowland, the Arabah, the hill country of Israel, and the lowland of the same;

name: Joshua 11:17
text: from Mount Halak, that goes up to Seir, even to Baal Gad in the valley of Lebanon under Mount Hermon. He took all their kings, struck them, and put them to death.

name: Joshua 11:18
text: Joshua made war a long time with all those kings.

name: Joshua 11:19
text: There was not a city that made peace with the children of Israel, except the Hivites, the inhabitants of Gibeon. They took all in battle.

name: Joshua 11:20
text: For it was of Yahweh to harden their hearts, to come against Israel in battle, that he might utterly destroy them, that they might have no favor, but that he might destroy them, as Yahweh commanded Moses.

name: Joshua 11:21
text: Joshua came at that time, and cut off the Anakim from the hill country, from Hebron, from Debir, from Anab, and from all the hill country of Judah, and from all the hill country of Israel: Joshua utterly destroyed them with their cities.

name: Joshua 11:22
text: There were none of the Anakim left in the land of the children of Israel. Only in Gaza, in Gath, and in Ashdod, did some remain.

name: Joshua 11:23
text: So Joshua took the whole land, according to all that Yahweh spoke to Moses; and Joshua gave it for an inheritance to Israel according to their divisions by their tribes. The land had rest from war.

name: Joshua 12:1
text: Now these are the kings of the land, whom the children of Israel struck, and possessed their land beyond the Jordan toward the sunrise, from the valley of the Arnon to Mount Hermon, and all the Arabah eastward:

name: Joshua 12:2
text: Sihon king of the Amorites, who lived in Heshbon, and ruled from Aroer, which is on the edge of the valley of the Arnon, and the middle of the valley, and half Gilead, even to the river Jabbok, the border of the children of Ammon;

name: Joshua 12:3
text: and the Arabah to the sea of Chinneroth, eastward, and to the sea of the Arabah, even the Salt Sea, eastward, the way to Beth Jeshimoth; and on the south, under the slopes of Pisgah:

name: Joshua 12:4
text: and the border of Og king of Bashan, of the remnant of the Rephaim, who lived at Ashtaroth and at Edrei,

name: Joshua 12:5
text: and ruled in Mount Hermon, and in Salecah, and in all Bashan, to the border of the Geshurites and the Maacathites, and half Gilead, the border of Sihon king of Heshbon.

name: Joshua 12:6
text: Moses the servant of Yahweh and the children of Israel struck them. Moses the servant of Yahweh gave it for a possession to the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh.

name: Joshua 12:7
text: These are the kings of the land whom Joshua and the children of Israel struck beyond the Jordan westward, from Baal Gad in the valley of Lebanon even to Mount Halak, that goes up to Seir. Joshua gave it to the tribes of Israel for a possession according to their divisions;

name: Joshua 12:8
text: in the hill country, and in the lowland, and in the Arabah, and in the slopes, and in the wilderness, and in the South; the Hittite, the Amorite, and the Canaanite, the Perizzite, the Hivite, and the Jebusite:

name: Joshua 12:9
text: the king of Jericho, one; the king of Ai, which is beside Bethel, one;

name: Joshua 12:10
text: the king of Jerusalem, one; the king of Hebron, one;

name: Joshua 12:11
text: the king of Jarmuth, one; the king of Lachish, one;

name: Joshua 12:12
text: the king of Eglon, one; the king of Gezer, one;

name: Joshua 12:13
text: the king of Debir, one; the king of Geder, one;

name: Joshua 12:14
text: the king of Hormah, one; the king of Arad, one;

name: Joshua 12:15
text: the king of Libnah, one; the king of Adullam, one;

name: Joshua 12:16
text: the king of Makkedah, one; the king of Bethel, one;

name: Joshua 12:17
text: the king of Tappuah, one; the king of Hepher, one;

name: Joshua 12:18
text: the king of Aphek, one; the king of Lassharon, one;

name: Joshua 12:19
text: the king of Madon, one; the king of Hazor, one;

name: Joshua 12:20
text: the king of Shimron Meron, one; the king of Achshaph, one;

name: Joshua 12:21
text: the king of Taanach, one; the king of Megiddo, one;

name: Joshua 12:22
text: the king of Kedesh, one; the king of Jokneam in Carmel, one;

name: Joshua 12:23
text: the king of Dor in the height of Dor, one; the king of Goiim in Gilgal, one;

name: Joshua 12:24
text: the king of Tirzah, one: all the kings thirty-one.

name: Joshua 13:1
text: Now Joshua was old and well advanced in years. Yahweh said to him, "You are old and advanced in years, and there remains yet very much land to be possessed.

name: Joshua 13:2
text: "This is the land that still remains: all the regions of the Philistines, and all the Geshurites;

name: Joshua 13:3
text: from the Shihor, which is before Egypt, even to the border of Ekron northward, which is counted as Canaanite; the five lords of the Philistines; the Gazites, and the Ashdodites, the Ashkelonites, the Gittites, and the Ekronites; also the Avvim,

name: Joshua 13:4
text: on the south; all the land of the Canaanites, and Mearah that belongs to the Sidonians, to Aphek, to the border of the Amorites;

name: Joshua 13:5
text: and the land of the Gebalites, and all Lebanon, toward the sunrise, from Baal Gad under Mount Hermon to the entrance of Hamath;

name: Joshua 13:6
text: all the inhabitants of the hill country from Lebanon to Misrephoth Maim, even all the Sidonians; them will I drive out from before the children of Israel: only allocate it to Israel for an inheritance, as I have commanded you.

name: Joshua 13:7
text: Now therefore divide this land for an inheritance to the nine tribes and the half-tribe of Manasseh."

name: Joshua 13:8
text: With him the Reubenites and the Gadites received their inheritance, which Moses gave them, beyond the Jordan eastward, even as Moses the servant of Yahweh gave them:

name: Joshua 13:9
text: from Aroer, that is on the edge of the valley of the Arnon, and the city that is in the middle of the valley, and all the plain of Medeba to Dibon;

name: Joshua 13:10
text: and all the cities of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon, to the border of the children of Ammon;

name: Joshua 13:11
text: and Gilead, and the border of the Geshurites and Maacathites, and all Mount Hermon, and all Bashan to Salecah;

name: Joshua 13:12
text: all the kingdom of Og in Bashan, who reigned in Ashtaroth and in Edrei (the same was left of the remnant of the Rephaim); for Moses attacked these, and drove them out.

name: Joshua 13:13
text: Nevertheless the children of Israel didn"t drive out the Geshurites, nor the Maacathites: but Geshur and Maacath dwell in the midst of Israel to this day.

name: Joshua 13:14
text: Only he gave no inheritance to the tribe of Levi. The offerings of Yahweh, the God of Israel, made by fire are his inheritance, as he spoke to him.

name: Joshua 13:15
text: Moses gave to the tribe of the children of Reuben according to their families.

name: Joshua 13:16
text: Their border was from Aroer, that is on the edge of the valley of the Arnon, and the city that is in the middle of the valley, and all the plain by Medeba;

name: Joshua 13:17
text: Heshbon, and all its cities that are in the plain; Dibon, Bamoth Baal, Beth Baal Meon,

name: Joshua 13:18
text: Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mephaath,

name: Joshua 13:19
text: Kiriathaim, Sibmah, Zereth Shahar in the mount of the valley,

name: Joshua 13:20
text: Beth Peor, the slopes of Pisgah, Beth Jeshimoth,

name: Joshua 13:21
text: all the cities of the plain, and all the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon, whom Moses struck with the chiefs of Midian, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, and Reba, the princes of Sihon, who lived in the land.

name: Joshua 13:22
text: The children of Israel alse killed Balaam also the son of Beor, the soothsayer, with the sword, among the rest of their slain.

name: Joshua 13:23
text: The border of the children of Reuben was the bank of the Jordan. This was the inheritance of the children of Reuben according to their families, the cities and its villages.

name: Joshua 13:24
text: Moses gave to the tribe of Gad, to the children of Gad, according to their families.

name: Joshua 13:25
text: Their border was Jazer, and all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the children of Ammon, to Aroer that is before Rabbah;

name: Joshua 13:26
text: and from Heshbon to Ramath Mizpeh, and Betonim; and from Mahanaim to the border of Debir;

name: Joshua 13:27
text: and in the valley, Beth Haram, Beth Nimrah, Succoth, and Zaphon, the rest of the kingdom of Sihon king of Heshbon, the Jordan"s bank, to the uttermost part of the sea of Chinnereth beyond the Jordan eastward.

name: Joshua 13:28
text: This is the inheritance of the children of Gad according to their families, the cities and its villages.

name: Joshua 13:29
text: Moses gave an inheritance to the half-tribe of Manasseh. It was for the half-tribe of the children of Manasseh according to their families.

name: Joshua 13:30
text: Their border was from Mahanaim, all Bashan, all the kingdom of Og king of Bashan, and all the towns of Jair, which are in Bashan, sixty cities.

name: Joshua 13:31
text: Half Gilead, Ashtaroth, and Edrei, the cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan, were for the children of Machir the son of Manasseh, even for the half of the children of Machir according to their families.

name: Joshua 13:32
text: These are the inheritances which Moses distributed in the plains of Moab, beyond the Jordan at Jericho, eastward.

name: Joshua 13:33
text: But to the tribe of Levi Moses gave no inheritance. Yahweh, the God of Israel, is their inheritance, as he spoke to them.

name: Joshua 14:1
text: These are the inheritances which the children of Israel took in the land of Canaan, which Eleazar the priest, Joshua the son of Nun, and the heads of the fathers" houses of the tribes of the children of Israel, distributed to them,

name: Joshua 14:2
text: by the lot of their inheritance, as Yahweh commanded by Moses, for the nine tribes, and for the half-tribe.

name: Joshua 14:3
text: For Moses had given the inheritance of the two tribes and the half-tribe beyond the Jordan; but to the Levites he gave no inheritance among them.

name: Joshua 14:4
text: For the children of Joseph were two tribes, Manasseh and Ephraim: and they gave no portion to the Levites in the land, except cities to dwell in, with their suburbs for their livestock and for their property.

name: Joshua 14:5
text: The children of Israel did as Yahweh commanded Moses, and they divided the land.

name: Joshua 14:6
text: Then the children of Judah drew near to Joshua in Gilgal. Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenizzite said to him, "You know the thing that Yahweh spoke to Moses the man of God concerning me and concerning you in Kadesh Barnea.

name: Joshua 14:7
text: I was forty years old when Moses the servant of Yahweh sent me from Kadesh Barnea to spy out the land. I brought him word again as it was in my heart.

name: Joshua 14:8
text: Nevertheless, my brothers who went up with me made the heart of the people melt; but I wholly followed Yahweh my God.

name: Joshua 14:9
text: Moses swore on that day, saying, "Surely the land where you walked shall be an inheritance to you and to your children forever, because you have wholly followed Yahweh my God."

name: Joshua 14:10
text: "Now, behold, Yahweh has kept me alive, as he spoke, these forty-five years, from the time that Yahweh spoke this word to Moses, while Israel walked in the wilderness. Now, behold, I am eighty-five years old, today.

name: Joshua 14:11
text: As yet I am as strong today as I was in the day that Moses sent me: as my strength was then, even so is my strength now for war, to go out and to come in.

name: Joshua 14:12
text: Now therefore give me this hill country, of which Yahweh spoke in that day; for you heard in that day how the Anakim were there, and great and fortified cities. It may be that Yahweh will be with me, and I shall drive them out, as Yahweh spoke."

name: Joshua 14:13
text: Joshua blessed him; and he gave Hebron to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for an inheritance.

name: Joshua 14:14
text: Therefore Hebron became the inheritance of Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenizzite to this day; because he wholly followed Yahweh, the God of Israel.

name: Joshua 14:15
text: Now the name of Hebron before was Kiriath Arba, after the greatest man among the Anakim. The land had rest from war.

name: Joshua 15:1
text: The lot for the tribe of the children of Judah according to their families was to the border of Edom, even to the wilderness of Zin southward, at the uttermost part of the south.

name: Joshua 15:2
text: Their south border was from the uttermost part of the Salt Sea, from the bay that looks southward;

name: Joshua 15:3
text: and it went out southward of the ascent of Akrabbim, and passed along to Zin, and went up by the south of Kadesh Barnea, and passed along by Hezron, went up to Addar, and turned about to Karka;

name: Joshua 15:4
text: and it passed along to Azmon, went out at the brook of Egypt; and the border ended at the sea. This shall be your south border.

name: Joshua 15:5
text: The east border was the Salt Sea, even to the end of the Jordan. The border of the north quarter was from the bay of the sea at the end of the Jordan.

name: Joshua 15:6
text: The border went up to Beth Hoglah, and passed along by the north of Beth Arabah; and the border went up to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben.

name: Joshua 15:7
text: The border went up to Debir from the valley of Achor, and so northward, looking toward Gilgal, that is over against the ascent of Adummim, which is on the south side of the river. The border passed along to the waters of En Shemesh, and ended at En Rogel.

name: Joshua 15:8
text: The border went up by the valley of the son of Hinnom to the side of the Jebusite southward (the same is Jerusalem); and the border went up to the top of the mountain that lies before the valley of Hinnom westward, which is at the farthest part of the valley of Rephaim northward.

name: Joshua 15:9
text: The border extended from the top of the mountain to the spring of the waters of Nephtoah, and went out to the cities of Mount Ephron; and the border extended to Baalah (the same is Kiriath Jearim);

name: Joshua 15:10
text: and the border turned about from Baalah westward to Mount Seir, and passed along to the side of Mount Jearim on the north (the same is Chesalon), and went down to Beth Shemesh, and passed along by Timnah;

name: Joshua 15:11
text: and the border went out to the side of Ekron northward; and the border extended to Shikkeron, and passed along to Mount Baalah, and went out at Jabneel; and the goings out of the border were at the sea.

name: Joshua 15:12
text: The west border was to the shore of the great sea. This is the border of the children of Judah according to their families.

name: Joshua 15:13
text: To Caleb the son of Jephunneh he gave a portion among the children of Judah, according to the commandment of Yahweh to Joshua, even Kiriath Arba, named after the father of Anak (the same is Hebron).

name: Joshua 15:14
text: Caleb drove out the three sons of Anak: Sheshai, and Ahiman, and Talmai, the children of Anak.

name: Joshua 15:15
text: He went up against the inhabitants of Debir: now the name of Debir before was Kiriath Sepher.

name: Joshua 15:16
text: Caleb said, "He who strikes Kiriath Sepher, and takes it, to him will I give Achsah my daughter as wife."

name: Joshua 15:17
text: Othniel the son of Kenaz, the brother of Caleb, took it: and he gave him Achsah his daughter as wife.

name: Joshua 15:18
text: It happened, when she came, that she had him ask her father fore a field. She got off of her donkey, and Caleb said, "What do you want?"

name: Joshua 15:19
text: She said, "Give me a blessing. Because you have set me in the land of the South, give me also springs of water." He gave her the upper springs and the lower springs.

name: Joshua 15:20
text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Judah according to their families.

name: Joshua 15:21
text: The farthest cities of the tribe of the children of Judah toward the border of Edom in the South were Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,

name: Joshua 15:22
text: Kinah, Dimonah, Adadah,

name: Joshua 15:23
text: Kedesh, Hazor, Ithnan,

name: Joshua 15:24
text: Ziph, Telem, Bealoth,

name: Joshua 15:25
text: Hazor Hadattah, Kerioth Hezron (the same is Hazor),

name: Joshua 15:26
text: Amam, Shema, Moladah,

name: Joshua 15:27
text: Hazar Gaddah, Heshmon, Beth Pelet,

name: Joshua 15:28
text: Hazar Shual, Beersheba, Biziothiah,

name: Joshua 15:29
text: Baalah, Iim, Ezem,

name: Joshua 15:30
text: Eltolad, Chesil, Hormah,

name: Joshua 15:31
text: Ziklag, Madmannah, Sansannah,

name: Joshua 15:32
text: Lebaoth, Shilhim, Ain, and Rimmon. All the cities are twenty-nine, with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:33
text: In the lowland, Eshtaol, Zorah, Ashnah,

name: Joshua 15:34
text: Zanoah, En Gannim, Tappuah, Enam,

name: Joshua 15:35
text: Jarmuth, Adullam, Socoh, Azekah,

name: Joshua 15:36
text: Shaaraim, Adithaim and Gederah (or Gederothaim); fourteen cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:37
text: Zenan, Hadashah, Migdal Gad,

name: Joshua 15:38
text: Dilean, Mizpeh, Joktheel,

name: Joshua 15:39
text: Lachish, Bozkath, Eglon,

name: Joshua 15:40
text: Cabbon, Lahmam, Chitlish,

name: Joshua 15:41
text: Gederoth, Beth Dagon, Naamah, and Makkedah; sixteen cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:42
text: Libnah, Ether, Ashan,

name: Joshua 15:43
text: Iphtah, Ashnah, Nezib,

name: Joshua 15:44
text: Keilah, Achzib, and Mareshah; nine cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:45
text: Ekron, with its towns and its villages;

name: Joshua 15:46
text: from Ekron even to the sea, all that were by the side of Ashdod, with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:47
text: Ashdod, its towns and its villages; Gaza, its towns and its villages; to the brook of Egypt, and the great sea with its coastline.

name: Joshua 15:48
text: In the hill country, Shamir, Jattir, Socoh,

name: Joshua 15:49
text: Dannah, Kiriath Sannah (which is Debir),

name: Joshua 15:50
text: Anab, Eshtemoh, Anim,

name: Joshua 15:51
text: Goshen, Holon, and Giloh; eleven cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:52
text: Arab, Dumah, Eshan,

name: Joshua 15:53
text: Janim, Beth Tappuah, Aphekah,

name: Joshua 15:54
text: Humtah, Kiriath Arba (the same is Hebron), and Zior; nine cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:55
text: Maon, Carmel, Ziph, Jutah,

name: Joshua 15:56
text: Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoah,

name: Joshua 15:57
text: Kain, Gibeah, and Timnah; ten cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:58
text: Halhul, Beth Zur, Gedor,

name: Joshua 15:59
text: Maarath, Beth Anoth, and Eltekon; six cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:60
text: Kiriath Baal (the same is Kiriath Jearim), and Rabbah; two cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:61
text: In the wilderness, Beth Arabah, Middin, Secacah,

name: Joshua 15:62
text: Nibshan, the City of Salt, and En Gedi; six cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 15:63
text: As for the Jebusites, the inhabitants of Jerusalem, the children of Judah couldn"t drive them out; but the Jebusites live with the children of Judah at Jerusalem to this day.

name: Joshua 16:1
text: The lot came out for the children of Joseph from the Jordan at Jericho, at the waters of Jericho on the east, even the wilderness, going up from Jericho through the hill country to Bethel.

name: Joshua 16:2
text: It went out from Bethel to Luz, and passed along to the border of the Archites to Ataroth;

name: Joshua 16:3
text: and it went down westward to the border of the Japhletites, to the border of Beth Horon the lower, even to Gezer; and ended at the sea.

name: Joshua 16:4
text: The children of Joseph, Manasseh and Ephraim, took their inheritance.

name: Joshua 16:5
text: This was the border of the children of Ephraim according to their families. The border of their inheritance eastward was Ataroth Addar, to Beth Horon the upper.

name: Joshua 16:6
text: The border went out westward at Michmethath on the north. The border turned about eastward to Taanath Shiloh, and passed along it on the east of Janoah.

name: Joshua 16:7
text: It went down from Janoah to Ataroth, to Naarah, reached to Jericho, and went out at the Jordan.

name: Joshua 16:8
text: From Tappuah the border went along westward to the brook of Kanah; and ended at the sea. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Ephraim according to their families;

name: Joshua 16:9
text: together with the cities which were set apart for the children of Ephraim in the midst of the inheritance of the children of Manasseh, all the cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 16:10
text: They didn"t drive out the Canaanites who lived in Gezer; but the Canaanites dwell in the midst of Ephraim to this day, and have become servants to do forced labor.

name: Joshua 17:1
text: This was the lot for the tribe of Manasseh, for he was the firstborn of Joseph. As for Machir the firstborn of Manasseh, the father of Gilead, because he was a man of war, therefore he had Gilead and Bashan.

name: Joshua 17:2
text: So this was for the rest of the children of Manasseh according to their families: for the children of Abiezer, for the children of Helek, for the children of Asriel, for the children of Shechem, for the children of Hepher, and for the children of Shemida: these were the male children of Manasseh the son of Joseph according to their families.

name: Joshua 17:3
text: But Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, had no sons, but daughters: and these are the names of his daughters: Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.

name: Joshua 17:4
text: They came near before Eleazar the priest, and before Joshua the son of Nun, and before the princes, saying, "Yahweh commanded Moses to give us an inheritance among our brothers." Therefore according to the commandment of Yahweh he gave them an inheritance among the brothers of their father.

name: Joshua 17:5
text: Ten parts fell to Manasseh, besides the land of Gilead and Bashan, which is beyond the Jordan;

name: Joshua 17:6
text: because the daughters of Manasseh had an inheritance among his sons. The land of Gilead belonged to the rest of the sons of Manasseh.

name: Joshua 17:7
text: The border of Manasseh was from Asher to Michmethath, which is before Shechem. The border went along to the right hand, to the inhabitants of En Tappuah.

name: Joshua 17:8
text: The land of Tappuah belonged to Manasseh; but Tappuah on the border of Manasseh belonged to the children of Ephraim.

name: Joshua 17:9
text: The border went down to the brook of Kanah, southward of the brook. These cities belonged to Ephraim among the cities of Manasseh. The border of Manasseh was on the north side of the brook, and ended at the sea.

name: Joshua 17:10
text: Southward it was Ephraim"s, and northward it was Manasseh"s, and the sea was his border. They reached to Asher on the north, and to Issachar on the east.

name: Joshua 17:11
text: Manasseh had three heights in Issachar, in Asher Beth Shean and its towns, and Ibleam and its towns, and the inhabitants of Dor and its towns, and the inhabitants of Endor and its towns, and the inhabitants of Taanach and its towns, and the inhabitants of Megiddo and its towns.

name: Joshua 17:12
text: Yet the children of Manasseh couldn"t drive out the inhabitants of those cities; but the Canaanites would dwell in that land.

name: Joshua 17:13
text: It happened, when the children of Israel had grown strong, that they put the Canaanites to forced labor, and didn"t utterly drive them out.

name: Joshua 17:14
text: The children of Joseph spoke to Joshua, saying, "Why have you given me just one lot and one part for an inheritance, since I am a great people, because Yahweh has blessed me so far?"

name: Joshua 17:15
text: Joshua said to them, "If you are a great people, go up to the forest, and clear land for yourself there in the land of the Perizzites and of the Rephaim; since the hill country of Ephraim is too narrow for you."

name: Joshua 17:16
text: The children of Joseph said, "The hill country is not enough for us. All the Canaanites who dwell in the land of the valley have chariots of iron, both those who are in Beth Shean and its towns, and those who are in the valley of Jezreel."

name: Joshua 17:17
text: Joshua spoke to the house of Joseph, even to Ephraim and to Manasseh, saying, "You are a great people, and have great power. You shall not have one lot only;

name: Joshua 17:18
text: but the hill country shall be yours. Although it is a forest, you shall cut it down, and it"s farthest extent shall be yours; for you shall drive out the Canaanites, though they have chariots of iron, and though they are strong."

name: Joshua 18:1
text: The whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled themselves together at Shiloh, and set up the Tent of Meeting there. The land was subdued before them.

name: Joshua 18:2
text: Seven tribes remained among the children of Israel, which had not yet divided their inheritance.

name: Joshua 18:3
text: Joshua said to the children of Israel, "How long will you neglect to go in to possess the land, which Yahweh, the God of your fathers, has given you?

name: Joshua 18:4
text: Appoint for yourselves three men from each tribe. I will send them, and they shall arise, walk through the land, and describe it according to their inheritance; and they shall come to me.

name: Joshua 18:5
text: They shall divide it into seven portions. Judah shall live in his borders on the south, and the house of Joseph shall live in their borders on the north.

name: Joshua 18:6
text: You shall survey the land into seven parts, and bring the description here to me; and I will cast lots for you here before Yahweh our God.

name: Joshua 18:7
text: For the Levites have no portion among you; for the priesthood of Yahweh is their inheritance. Gad, Reuben, and the half-tribe of Manasseh have received their inheritance beyond the Jordan eastward, which Moses the servant of Yahweh gave them."

name: Joshua 18:8
text: The men arose and went. Joshua commanded those who went to survey the land, saying, "Go walk through the land, survey it, and come again to me. I will cast lots for you here before Yahweh in Shiloh."

name: Joshua 18:9
text: The men went and passed through the land, and surveyed it by cities into seven portions in a book. They came to Joshua to the camp at Shiloh.

name: Joshua 18:10
text: Joshua cast lots for them in Shiloh before Yahweh. There Joshua divided the land to the children of Israel according to their divisions.

name: Joshua 18:11
text: The lot of the tribe of the children of Benjamin came up according to their families. The border of their lot went out between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.

name: Joshua 18:12
text: Their border on the north quarter was from the Jordan. The border went up to the side of Jericho on the north, and went up through the hill country westward. It ended at the wilderness of Beth Aven.

name: Joshua 18:13
text: The border passed along from there to Luz, to the side of Luz (the same is Bethel), southward. The border went down to Ataroth Addar, by the mountain that lies on the south of Beth Horon the lower.

name: Joshua 18:14
text: The border extended, and turned around on the west quarter southward, from the mountain that lies before Beth Horon southward; and ended at Kiriath Baal (the same is Kiriath Jearim), a city of the children of Judah. This was the west quarter.

name: Joshua 18:15
text: The south quarter was from the farthest part of Kiriath Jearim. The border went out westward, and went out to the spring of the waters of Nephtoah.

name: Joshua 18:16
text: The border went down to the farthest part of the mountain that lies before the valley of the son of Hinnom, which is in the valley of Rephaim northward. It went down to the valley of Hinnom, to the side of the Jebusite southward, and went down to En Rogel.

name: Joshua 18:17
text: It extended northward, went out at En Shemesh, and went out to Geliloth, which is over against the ascent of Adummim. It went down to the stone of Bohan the son of Reuben.

name: Joshua 18:18
text: It passed along to the side over against the Arabah northward, and went down to the Arabah.

name: Joshua 18:19
text: The border passed along to the side of Beth Hoglah northward; and the border ended at the north bay of the Salt Sea, at the south end of the Jordan. This was the south border.

name: Joshua 18:20
text: The Jordan was its border on the east quarter. This was the inheritance of the children of Benjamin, by the borders around it, according to their families.

name: Joshua 18:21
text: Now the cities of the tribe of the children of Benjamin according to their families were Jericho, Beth Hoglah, Emek Keziz,

name: Joshua 18:22
text: Beth Arabah, Zemaraim, Bethel,

name: Joshua 18:23
text: Avvim, Parah, Ophrah,

name: Joshua 18:24
text: Chephar Ammoni, Ophni, and Geba; twelve cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 18:25
text: Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,

name: Joshua 18:26
text: Mizpeh, Chephirah, Mozah,

name: Joshua 18:27
text: Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah,

name: Joshua 18:28
text: Zelah, Eleph, the Jebusite (the same is Jerusalem), Gibeath, and Kiriath; fourteen cities with their villages. This is the inheritance of the children of Benjamin according to their families.

name: Joshua 19:1
text: The second lot came out for Simeon, even for the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families. Their inheritance was in the midst of the inheritance of the children of Judah.

name: Joshua 19:2
text: They had for their inheritance Beersheba (or Sheba), Moladah,

name: Joshua 19:3
text: Hazar Shual, Balah, Ezem,

name: Joshua 19:4
text: Eltolad, Bethul, Hormah,

name: Joshua 19:5
text: Ziklag, Beth Marcaboth, Hazar Susah,

name: Joshua 19:6
text: Beth Lebaoth, and Sharuhen; thirteen cities with their villages;

name: Joshua 19:7
text: Ain, Rimmon, Ether, and Ashan; four cities with their villages;

name: Joshua 19:8
text: and all the villages that were around these cities to Baalath Beer, Ramah of the South. This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families.

name: Joshua 19:9
text: Out of the part of the children of Judah was the inheritance of the children of Simeon; for the portion of the children of Judah was too much for them. Therefore the children of Simeon had inheritance in the midst of their inheritance.

name: Joshua 19:10
text: The third lot came up for the children of Zebulun according to their families. The border of their inheritance was to Sarid.

name: Joshua 19:11
text: Their border went up westward, even to Maralah, and reached to Dabbesheth. It reached to the brook that is before Jokneam.

name: Joshua 19:12
text: It turned from Sarid eastward toward the sunrise to the border of Chisloth Tabor. It went out to Daberath, and went up to Japhia.

name: Joshua 19:13
text: From there it passed along eastward to Gath Hepher, to Ethkazin; and it went out at Rimmon which stretches to Neah.

name: Joshua 19:14
text: The border turned around it on the north to Hannathon; and it ended at the valley of Iphtah El;

name: Joshua 19:15
text: Kattath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idalah, and Bethlehem: twelve cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:16
text: This is the inheritance of the children of Zebulun according to their families, these cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:17
text: The fourth lot came out for Issachar, even for the children of Issachar according to their families.

name: Joshua 19:18
text: Their border was to Jezreel, Chesulloth, Shunem,

name: Joshua 19:19
text: Hapharaim, Shion, Anaharath,

name: Joshua 19:20
text: Rabbith, Kishion, Ebez,

name: Joshua 19:21
text: Remeth, Engannim, En Haddah, and Beth Pazzez.

name: Joshua 19:22
text: The border reached to Tabor, Shahazumah, and Beth Shemesh. Their border ended at the Jordan: sixteen cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:23
text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Issachar according to their families, the cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:24
text: The fifth lot came out for the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families.

name: Joshua 19:25
text: Their border was Helkath, Hali, Beten, Achshaph,

name: Joshua 19:26
text: Allammelech, Amad, Mishal. It reached to Carmel westward, and to Shihorlibnath.

name: Joshua 19:27
text: It turned toward the sunrise to Beth Dagon, and reached to Zebulun, and to the valley of Iphtah El northward to Beth Emek and Neiel. It went out to Cabul on the left hand,

name: Joshua 19:28
text: and Ebron, Rehob, Hammon, and Kanah, even to great Sidon.

name: Joshua 19:29
text: The border turned to Ramah, to the fortified city of Tyre; and the border turned to Hosah. It ended at the sea by the region of Achzib;

name: Joshua 19:30
text: Ummah also, and Aphek, and Rehob: twenty-two cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:31
text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Asher according to their families, these cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:32
text: The sixth lot came out for the children of Naphtali, even for the children of Naphtali according to their families.

name: Joshua 19:33
text: Their border was from Heleph, from the oak in Zaanannim, Adaminekeb, and Jabneel, to Lakkum. It ended at the Jordan.

name: Joshua 19:34
text: The border turned westward to Aznoth Tabor, and went out from there to Hukkok. It reached to Zebulun on the south, and reached to Asher on the west, and to Judah at the Jordan toward the sunrise.

name: Joshua 19:35
text: The fortified cities were Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakkath, Chinnereth,

name: Joshua 19:36
text: Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,

name: Joshua 19:37
text: Kedesh, Edrei, En Hazor,

name: Joshua 19:38
text: Iron, Migdal El, Horem, Beth Anath, and Beth Shemesh; nineteen cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:39
text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Naphtali according to their families, the cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:40
text: The seventh lot came out for the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families.

name: Joshua 19:41
text: The border of their inheritance was Zorah, Eshtaol, Irshemesh,

name: Joshua 19:42
text: Shaalabbin, Aijalon, Ithlah,

name: Joshua 19:43
text: Elon, Timnah, Ekron,

name: Joshua 19:44
text: Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,

name: Joshua 19:45
text: Jehud, Bene Berak, Gath Rimmon,

name: Joshua 19:46
text: Me Jarkon, and Rakkon, with the border over against Joppa.

name: Joshua 19:47
text: The border of the children of Dan went out beyond them; for the children of Dan went up and fought against Leshem, and took it, and struck it with the edge of the sword, and possessed it, and lived therein, and called Leshem, Dan, after the name of Dan their father.

name: Joshua 19:48
text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families, these cities with their villages.

name: Joshua 19:49
text: So they made an end of distributing the land for inheritance by its borders. The children of Israel gave an inheritance to Joshua the son of Nun in their midst.

name: Joshua 19:50
text: According to the commandment of Yahweh, they gave him the city which he asked, even Timnathserah in the hill country of Ephraim; and he built the city, and lived there.

name: Joshua 19:51
text: These are the inheritances, which Eleazar the priest, Joshua the son of Nun, and the heads of the fathers" houses of the tribes of the children of Israel, distributed for inheritance by lot in Shiloh before Yahweh, at the door of the Tent of Meeting. So they made an end of dividing the land.

name: Joshua 20:1
text: Yahweh spoke to Joshua, saying,

name: Joshua 20:2
text: "Speak to the children of Israel, saying, "Assign the cities of refuge, of which I spoke to you by Moses,

name: Joshua 20:3
text: that the manslayer who kills any person accidentally or unintentionally may flee there. They shall be to you for a refuge from the avenger of blood.

name: Joshua 20:4
text: He shall flee to one of those cities, and shall stand at the entrance of the gate of the city, and declare his cause in the ears of the elders of that city. They shall take him into the city with them, and give him a place, that he may live among them.

name: Joshua 20:5
text: If the avenger of blood pursue after him, then they shall not deliver up the manslayer into his hand; because he struck his neighbor unintentionally, and didn"t hate him before.

name: Joshua 20:6
text: He shall dwell in that city until he stands before the congregation for judgment, until the death of the high priest that shall be in those days. Then the manslayer shall return, and come to his own city, and to his own house, to the city he fled from.""

name: Joshua 20:7
text: They set apart Kedesh in Galilee in the hill country of Naphtali, Shechem in the hill country of Ephraim, and Kiriath Arba (the same is Hebron) in the hill country of Judah.

name: Joshua 20:8
text: Beyond the Jordan at Jericho eastward, they assigned Bezer in the wilderness in the plain out of the tribe of Reuben, Ramoth in Gilead out of the tribe of Gad, and Golan in Bashan out of the tribe of Manasseh.

name: Joshua 20:9
text: These were the appointed cities for all the children of Israel, and for the alien who lives among them, that whoever kills any person unintentionally might flee there, and not die by the hand of the avenger of blood, until he stands before the congregation.

name: Joshua 21:1
text: Then the heads of fathers" houses of the Levites came near to Eleazar the priest, and to Joshua the son of Nun, and to the heads of fathers" houses of the tribes of the children of Israel.

name: Joshua 21:2
text: They spoke to them at Shiloh in the land of Canaan, saying, "Yahweh commanded Moses to give us cities to dwell in, with their suburbs for our livestock."

name: Joshua 21:3
text: The children of Israel gave to the Levites out of their inheritance, according to the commandment of Yahweh, these cities with their suburbs.

name: Joshua 21:4
text: The lot came out for the families of the Kohathites. The children of Aaron the priest, who were of the Levites, had thirteen cities by lot out of the tribe of Judah, out of the tribe of the Simeonites, and out of the tribe of Benjamin.

name: Joshua 21:5
text: The rest of the children of Kohath had ten cities by lot out of the families of the tribe of Ephraim, out of the tribe of Dan, and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh.

name: Joshua 21:6
text: The children of Gershon had thirteen cities by lot out of the families of the tribe of Issachar, out of the tribe of Asher, out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the half-tribe of Manasseh in Bashan.

name: Joshua 21:7
text: The children of Merari according to their families had twelve cities out of the tribe of Reuben, out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun.

name: Joshua 21:8
text: The children of Israel gave these cities with their suburbs by lot to the Levites, as Yahweh commanded by Moses.

name: Joshua 21:9
text: They gave out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, these cities which are mentioned by name:

name: Joshua 21:10
text: and they were for the children of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites, who were of the children of Levi; for theirs was the first lot.

name: Joshua 21:11
text: They gave them Kiriath Arba, named after the father of Anak (the same is Hebron), in the hill country of Judah, with its suburbs around it.

name: Joshua 21:12
text: But they gave the fields of the city and its villages to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for his possession.

name: Joshua 21:13
text: To the children of Aaron the priest they gave Hebron with its suburbs, the city of refuge for the manslayer, Libnah with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:14
text: Jattir with its suburbs, Eshtemoa with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:15
text: Holon with its suburbs, Debir with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:16
text: Ain with its suburbs, Juttah with its suburbs, and Beth Shemesh with its suburbs; nine cities out of those two tribes.

name: Joshua 21:17
text: Out of the tribe of Benjamin, Gibeon with its suburbs, Geba with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:18
text: Anathoth with its suburbs, and Almon with its suburbs; four cities.

name: Joshua 21:19
text: All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests, were thirteen cities with their suburbs.

name: Joshua 21:20
text: The families of the children of Kohath, the Levites, even the rest of the children of Kohath, had the cities of their lot out of the tribe of Ephraim.

name: Joshua 21:21
text: They gave them Shechem with its suburbs in the hill country of Ephraim, the city of refuge for the manslayer, and Gezer with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:22
text: Kibzaim with its suburbs, and Beth Horon with its suburbs; four cities.

name: Joshua 21:23
text: Out of the tribe of Dan, Elteke with its suburbs, Gibbethon with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:24
text: Aijalon with its suburbs, Gath Rimmon with its suburbs; four cities.

name: Joshua 21:25
text: Out of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Taanach with its suburbs, and Gath Rimmon with its suburbs; two cities.

name: Joshua 21:26
text: All the cities of the families of the rest of the children of Kohath were ten with their suburbs.

name: Joshua 21:27
text: They gave to the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, out of the half-tribe of Manasseh Golan in Bashan with its suburbs, the city of refuge for the manslayer, and Be Eshterah with its suburbs; two cities.

name: Joshua 21:28
text: Out of the tribe of Issachar, Kishion with its suburbs, Daberath with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:29
text: Jarmuth with its suburbs, En Gannim with its suburbs; four cities.

name: Joshua 21:30
text: Out of the tribe of Asher, Mishal with its suburbs, Abdon with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:31
text: Helkath with its suburbs, and Rehob with its suburbs; four cities.

name: Joshua 21:32
text: Out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with its suburbs, the city of refuge for the manslayer, Hammothdor with its suburbs, and Kartan with its suburbs; three cities.

name: Joshua 21:33
text: All the cities of the Gershonites according to their families were thirteen cities with their suburbs.

name: Joshua 21:34
text: To the families of the children of Merari, the rest of the Levites, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Jokneam with its suburbs, Kartah with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:35
text: Dimnah with its suburbs, and Nahalal with its suburbs; four cities.

name: Joshua 21:36
text: Out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer with its suburbs, Jahaz with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:37
text: Kedemoth with its suburbs, and Mephaath with its suburbs; four cities.

name: Joshua 21:38
text: Out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its suburbs, the city of refuge for the manslayer, and Mahanaim with its suburbs,

name: Joshua 21:39
text: Heshbon with its suburbs, Jazer with its suburbs; four cities in all.

name: Joshua 21:40
text: All these were the cities of the children of Merari according to their families, even the rest of the families of the Levites. Their lot was twelve cities.

name: Joshua 21:41
text: All the cities of the Levites in the midst of the possession of the children of Israel were forty-eight cities with their suburbs.

name: Joshua 21:42
text: Each of these cities included their suburbs around them. It was this way with all these cities.

name: Joshua 21:43
text: So Yahweh gave to Israel all the land which he swore to give to their fathers. They possessed it, and lived in it.

name: Joshua 21:44
text: Yahweh gave them rest all around, according to all that he swore to their fathers. Not a man of all their enemies stood before them. Yahweh delivered all their enemies into their hand.

name: Joshua 21:45
text: Nothing failed of any good thing which Yahweh had spoken to the house of Israel. All came to pass.

name: Joshua 22:1
text: Then Joshua called the Reubenites, the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh,

name: Joshua 22:2
text: and said to them, "You have kept all that Moses the servant of Yahweh commanded you, and have listened to my voice in all that I commanded you.

name: Joshua 22:3
text: You have not left your brothers these many days to this day, but have performed the duty of the commandment of Yahweh your God.

name: Joshua 22:4
text: Now Yahweh your God has given rest to your brothers, as he spoke to them. Therefore now return and go to your tents, to the land of your possession, which Moses the servant of Yahweh gave you beyond the Jordan.

name: Joshua 22:5
text: Only take diligent heed to do the commandment and the law which Moses the servant of Yahweh commanded you, to love Yahweh your God, to walk in all his ways, to keep his commandments, to hold fast to him, and to serve him with all your heart and with all your soul."

name: Joshua 22:6
text: So Joshua blessed them, and sent them away; and they went to their tents.

name: Joshua 22:7
text: Now to the one half-tribe of Manasseh Moses had given inheritance in Bashan; but to the other half gave Joshua among their brothers beyond the Jordan westward. Moreover when Joshua sent them away to their tents, he blessed them,

name: Joshua 22:8
text: and spoke to them, saying, "Return with much wealth to your tents, with very much livestock, with silver, with gold, with brass, with iron, and with very much clothing. Divide the spoil of your enemies with your brothers."

name: Joshua 22:9
text: The children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh returned, and departed from the children of Israel out of Shiloh, which is in the land of Canaan, to go to the land of Gilead, to the land of their possession, which they owned, according to the commandment of Yahweh by Moses.

name: Joshua 22:10
text: When they came to the region about the Jordan, that is in the land of Canaan, the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh built there an altar by the Jordan, a great altar to look at.

name: Joshua 22:11
text: The children of Israel heard this, "Behold, the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh have built an altar in the forefront of the land of Canaan, in the region about the Jordan, on the side that pertains to the children of Israel."

name: Joshua 22:12
text: When the children of Israel heard of it, the whole congregation of the children of Israel gathered themselves together at Shiloh, to go up against them to war.

name: Joshua 22:13
text: The children of Israel sent to the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the half-tribe of Manasseh, into the land of Gilead, Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest,

name: Joshua 22:14
text: and with him ten princes, one prince of a fathers" house for each of the tribes of Israel; and they were everyone of them head of their fathers" houses among the thousands of Israel.

name: Joshua 22:15
text: They came to the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the half-tribe of Manasseh, to the land of Gilead, and they spoke with them, saying,

name: Joshua 22:16
text: "Thus says the whole congregation of Yahweh, "What trespass is this that you have committed against the God of Israel, to turn away this day from following Yahweh, in that you have built yourselves an altar, to rebel this day against Yahweh?

name: Joshua 22:17
text: Is the iniquity of Peor too little for us, from which we have not cleansed ourselves to this day, although there came a plague on the congregation of Yahweh,

name: Joshua 22:18
text: that you must turn away this day from following Yahweh? It will be, since you rebel today against Yahweh, that tomorrow he will be angry with the whole congregation of Israel.

name: Joshua 22:19
text: However, if the land of your possession is unclean, then pass over to the land of the possession of Yahweh, in which Yahweh"s tabernacle dwells, and take possession among us; but don"t rebel against Yahweh, nor rebel against us, in building an altar other than the altar of Yahweh our God.

name: Joshua 22:20
text: Didn"t Achan the son of Zerah commit a trespass in the devoted thing, and wrath fell on all the congregation of Israel? That man didn"t perish alone in his iniquity.""

name: Joshua 22:21
text: Then the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh answered, and spoke to the heads of the thousands of Israel,

name: Joshua 22:22
text: "The Mighty One, God, Yahweh, the Mighty One, God, Yahweh, he knows; and Israel shall know: if it was in rebellion, or if in trespass against Yahweh (don"t save us this day),

name: Joshua 22:23
text: that we have built us an altar to turn away from following Yahweh; or if to offer burnt offering or meal offering, or if to offer sacrifices of peace offerings, let Yahweh himself require it.

name: Joshua 22:24
text: "If we have not out of concern done this, and for a reason, saying, "In time to come your children might speak to our children, saying, "What have you to do with Yahweh, the God of Israel?

name: Joshua 22:25
text: For Yahweh has made the Jordan a border between us and you, you children of Reuben and children of Gad. You have no portion in Yahweh."" So your children might make our children cease from fearing Yahweh.

name: Joshua 22:26
text: "Therefore we said, "Let"s now prepare to build ourselves an altar, not for burnt offering, nor for sacrifice;

name: Joshua 22:27
text: but it will be a witness between us and you, and between our generations after us, that we may perform the service of Yahweh before him with our burnt offerings, with our sacrifices, and with our peace offerings;" that your children may not tell our children in time to come, "You have no portion in Yahweh."

name: Joshua 22:28
text: "Therefore we said, "It shall be, when they tell us or our generations this in time to come, that we shall say, "Behold the pattern of the altar of Yahweh, which our fathers made, not for burnt offering, nor for sacrifice; but it is a witness between us and you.""

name: Joshua 22:29
text: "Far be it from us that we should rebel against Yahweh, and turn away this day from following Yahweh, to build an altar for burnt offering, for meal offering, or for sacrifice, besides the altar of Yahweh our God that is before his tabernacle!"

name: Joshua 22:30
text: When Phinehas the priest, and the princes of the congregation, even the heads of the thousands of Israel that were with him, heard the words that the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the children of Manasseh spoke, it pleased them well.

name: Joshua 22:31
text: Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest said to the children of Reuben, to the children of Gad, and to the children of Manasseh, "Today we know that Yahweh is in the midst of us, because you have not committed this trespass against Yahweh. Now you have delivered the children of Israel out of the hand of Yahweh."

name: Joshua 22:32
text: Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, and the princes, returned from the children of Reuben, and from the children of Gad, out of the land of Gilead, to the land of Canaan, to the children of Israel, and brought them word again.

name: Joshua 22:33
text: The thing pleased the children of Israel; and the children of Israel blessed God, and spoke no more of going up against them to war, to destroy the land in which the children of Reuben and the children of Gad lived.

name: Joshua 22:34
text: The children of Reuben and the children of Gad named the altar "A Witness Between Us that Yahweh is God."

name: Joshua 23:1
text: It happened after many days, when Yahweh had given rest to Israel from their enemies all around, and Joshua was old and well advanced in years,

name: Joshua 23:2
text: that Joshua called for all Israel, for their elders and for their heads, and for their judges and for their officers, and said to them, "I am old and well advanced in years.

name: Joshua 23:3
text: You have seen all that Yahweh your God has done to all these nations because of you; for it is Yahweh your God who has fought for you.

name: Joshua 23:4
text: Behold, I have allotted to you these nations that remain, to be an inheritance for your tribes, from the Jordan, with all the nations that I have cut off, even to the great sea toward the going down of the sun.

name: Joshua 23:5
text: Yahweh your God will thrust them out from before you, and drive them from out of your sight. You shall possess their land, as Yahweh your God spoke to you.

name: Joshua 23:6
text: "Therefore be very courageous to keep and to do all that is written in the book of the law of Moses, that you not turn aside from it to the right hand or to the left;

name: Joshua 23:7
text: that you not come among these nations, these that remain among you; neither make mention of the name of their gods, nor cause to swear by them, neither serve them, nor bow down yourselves to them;

name: Joshua 23:8
text: but hold fast to Yahweh your God, as you have done to this day.

name: Joshua 23:9
text: "For Yahweh has driven great and strong nations out from before you. But as for you, no man has stood before you to this day.

name: Joshua 23:10
text: One man of you shall chase a thousand; for it is Yahweh your God who fights for you, as he spoke to you.

name: Joshua 23:11
text: Take good heed therefore to yourselves, that you love Yahweh your God.

name: Joshua 23:12
text: "But if you do at all go back, and hold fast to the remnant of these nations, even these who remain among you, and make marriages with them, and go in to them, and they to you;

name: Joshua 23:13
text: know for a certainty that Yahweh your God will no longer drive these nations from out of your sight; but they shall be a snare and a trap to you, a scourge in your sides, and thorns in your eyes, until you perish from off this good land which Yahweh your God has given you.

name: Joshua 23:14
text: "Behold, today I am going the way of all the earth. You know in all your hearts and in all your souls that not one thing has failed of all the good things which Yahweh your God spoke concerning you. All have happened to you. Not one thing has failed of it.

name: Joshua 23:15
text: It shall happen that as all the good things have come on you of which Yahweh your God spoke to you, so Yahweh will bring on you all the evil things, until he has destroyed you from off this good land which Yahweh your God has given you,

name: Joshua 23:16
text: when you disobey the covenant of Yahweh your God, which he commanded you, and go and serve other gods, and bow down yourselves to them. Then the anger of Yahweh will be kindled against you, and you will perish quickly from off the good land which he has given to you."

name: Joshua 24:1
text: Joshua gathered all the tribes of Israel to Shechem, and called for the elders of Israel, for their heads, for their judges, and for their officers; and they presented themselves before God.

name: Joshua 24:2
text: Joshua said to all the people, "Thus says Yahweh, the God of Israel, "Your fathers lived of old time beyond the River, even Terah, the father of Abraham, and the father of Nahor: and they served other gods.

name: Joshua 24:3
text: I took your father Abraham from beyond the River, and led him throughout all the land of Canaan, and multiplied his seed, and gave him Isaac.

name: Joshua 24:4
text: I gave to Isaac Jacob and Esau: and I gave to Esau Mount Seir, to possess it. Jacob and his children went down into Egypt.

name: Joshua 24:5
text: ""I sent Moses and Aaron, and I plagued Egypt, according to that which I did in its midst: and afterward I brought you out.

name: Joshua 24:6
text: I brought your fathers out of Egypt: and you came to the sea. The Egyptians pursued after your fathers with chariots and with horsemen to the Red Sea.

name: Joshua 24:7
text: When they cried out to Yahweh, he put darkness between you and the Egyptians, and brought the sea on them, and covered them; and your eyes saw what I did in Egypt: and you lived in the wilderness many days.

name: Joshua 24:8
text: ""I brought you into the land of the Amorites, that lived beyond the Jordan: and they fought with you; and I gave them into your hand. You possessed their land; and I destroyed them from before you.

name: Joshua 24:9
text: Then Balak the son of Zippor, king of Moab, arose and fought against Israel. He sent and called Balaam the son of Beor to curse you;

name: Joshua 24:10
text: but I would not listen to Balaam; therefore he blessed you still. So I delivered you out of his hand.

name: Joshua 24:11
text: ""You went over the Jordan, and came to Jericho. The men of Jericho fought against you, the Amorite, the Perizzite, the Canaanite, the Hittite, the Girgashite, the Hivite, and the Jebusite; and I delivered them into your hand.

name: Joshua 24:12
text: I sent the hornet before you, which drove them out from before you, even the two kings of the Amorites; not with your sword, nor with your bow.

name: Joshua 24:13
text: I gave you a land whereon you had not labored, and cities which you didn"t build, and you live in them. You eat of vineyards and olive groves which you didn"t plant."

name: Joshua 24:14
text: "Now therefore fear Yahweh, and serve him in sincerity and in truth. Put away the gods which your fathers served beyond the River, in Egypt; and serve Yahweh.

name: Joshua 24:15
text: If it seems evil to you to serve Yahweh, choose this day whom you will serve; whether the gods which your fathers served that were beyond the River, or the gods of the Amorites, in whose land you dwell: but as for me and my house, we will serve Yahweh."

name: Joshua 24:16
